Headline: #8 Halsted Temporary Reroute at Halsted/18th
ShortDescription: 8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, Cermak, Canal, Roosevelt and Halsted: near Halsted/18th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Halsted, Cermak, Canal, Roosevelt, Halsted and over regular route, due to a parade near Halsted/18th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express, #15 Jeffery Local, #28 Stony Island Temporary Reroute near Lake Park/55th
ShortDescription: #6 Jackson Park Express, #15 Jeffery Local & #28 Stony Island buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Lake Park/55th, due to a Marathon.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#6 Jackson Park Express, #15 Jeffery Local & #28 Stony Island buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Lake Park/55th, due to a Marathon.

Northbound buses will operate via Stony Island, 63rd, Hayes Drive, Lake Shore Drive, 57th, Hyde Park and 55th.

Southbound buses will operate via Lake Park, 55th, Hyde Park, 57th Cornell Drive, 59th and Stony Island.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Reroute at 115th/State.
ShortDescription: #115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 115th, Michigan, 119th and Wentworth, due to a street blockage near 115th/State.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 115th, Michigan, 119th and Wentworth, then resume their normal route, due to a street blockage near 115th/State.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #29 State Temporary Reroute near State/Lake
ShortDescription: #29 State buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to a festival near State/Lake.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#29 State buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to a festival near State/Lake.

Southbound buses will operate via State, Kinize, Clark and Ida B. Wells, then resume their normal route.

Northbound buses will operate via State, Ida B. Wells, Dearborn and Illinois, then resume their route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #36 Broadway Temporary Southbound Reroute near State/Lake
ShortDescription: Southbound #36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted via State, Kinize, Clark and Van Buren, then resume normal route, due to a festival near State/Lake.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted via State, Kinize, Clark and Van Buren, then resume normal route, due to a festival near State/Lake.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
